newProducts.title: ADK Go
newProducts.description: A code-first Go toolkit for building AI agents featuring idiomatic Go design, rich tool ecosystem, modular multi-agent systems, and cloud deployment support. Launched in 2025 as Google's toolkit for AI agent development.

newProducts.title: Memori
newProducts.description: Open-source SQL-native memory engine for AI that enables LLMs to remember conversations with one line of code. Supports standard SQL databases and offers 80-90% cost savings by avoiding expensive vector databases.

newProducts.title: codemap
newProducts.description: CLI tool that generates compact, visually structured maps of codebases for LLM context. Helps AI systems understand project architecture efficiently by highlighting important files and reducing noise.

newProducts.title: reader3
newProducts.description: Lightweight self-hosted EPUB reader that enables reading books chapter by chapter with LLM assistance. Created by Andrej Karpathy for seamless content copying to AI models.

newProducts.title: TrendRadar
newProducts.description: AI-powered news monitoring tool that tracks and analyzes trending topics across various sources. Part of the new wave of AI agents for information gathering and analysis.

whitelistUpdates.title: Cursor 2.1 Released
whitelistUpdates.description: Released with Improved Plan Mode, AI Code Review in Editor, and Instant Grep features

whitelistUpdates.title: Coding Agent Productivity Study
whitelistUpdates.description: Research shows companies merge 39% more PRs after Cursor's agent became default

whitelistUpdates.title: Semantic Search Performance Improvement
whitelistUpdates.description: Semantic search improves coding agent performance with 12.5% higher accuracy

insights.title: The Rise of Agentic Coding Systems
insights.description: Discussion about how AI agents are evolving from simple code completion to autonomous coding systems that can understand context, make decisions, and execute complex multi-step tasks. Key insights include the importance of tool use capabilities and the shift from copilot to autonomous agent paradigms.
insights.author: Andrej Karpathy

insights.title: LLM Tool Use and Function Calling Evolution
insights.description: Analysis of how modern LLMs are becoming more sophisticated at using external tools and APIs. Focus on practical implementation patterns for function calling, error handling, and the importance of structured outputs for reliable AI coding assistants.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: Replit Agent and the Future of IDEs
insights.description: Insights into how AI-native development environments are changing the coding workflow. Discussion of Replit's Agent capabilities and how they integrate with traditional development tools, emphasizing the importance of context awareness and iterative development.
insights.author: Amjad Masad

insights.title: The Economic Impact of AI on Software Development
insights.description: Analysis of how AI coding tools are affecting developer productivity and the software development lifecycle. Discussion of both the opportunities and challenges, including concerns about code quality and the need for human oversight.
insights.author: Various Industry Leaders

insights.title: Multi-Modal AI for Code Understanding
insights.description: Exploration of how vision-language models are being applied to code comprehension, including understanding UI mockups, diagrams, and visual design patterns. Technical discussion about training approaches and evaluation metrics.
insights.author: Andrej Karpathy

insights.title: Prompt Engineering for Complex Coding Tasks
insights.description: Best practices for crafting effective prompts for AI coding assistants, including the importance of context specification, iterative refinement, and the use of structured prompting techniques for complex multi-file projects.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: The Future of Programming Languages in AI Era
insights.description: Discussion about how programming languages might evolve to better support AI-assisted development, including potential new language features, better type systems for AI integration, and the role of domain-specific languages.
insights.author: Lex Fridman Podcast Guests

insights.title: AI Code Generation and Security Concerns
insights.description: Analysis of security implications of AI-generated code, including discussion about vulnerability detection, secure coding practices, and the need for specialized security-focused AI tools in the development pipeline.
insights.author: Security Researchers
